verses.verse: A Song<WH7892> of degrees.<WH4609> Out of the depths<WH4615> have I cried<WH7121> to you, O LORD.<WH3068>
Lord,<WH136> hear<WH8085> my voice:<WH6963> let your ears<WH241> be attentive<WH7183> to the voice<WH6963> of my supplications.<WH8469>
If<WH518> you, LORD,<WH3050> should mark<WH8104> iniquities,<WH5771> O Lord,<WH136> who<WH4310> shall stand?<WH5975>
But there is forgiveness<WH5547> with you, that you may be feared.<WH3372>
I wait<WH6960> for the LORD,<WH3068> my soul<WH5315> does wait,<WH6960> and in his word<WH1697> do I hope.<WH3176>
My soul<WH5315> waits for the Lord<WH136> more than they that watch<WH8104> for the morning:<WH1242> I say, more than they that watch<WH8104> for the morning.<WH1242>
Let Israel<WH3478> hope<WH3176> in the LORD:<WH3068> for with the LORD<WH3068> there is mercy,<WH2617> and with him is plenteous<WH7235> redemption.<WH6304>
And he shall redeem<WH6299> Israel<WH3478> from all<WH3605> his iniquities.<WH5771>
